title: Verify: Implement Image Gen Node
description:
Run automated tests for task T-053.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement a universal Image Gen Node supporting DALL-E 3, Stability AI, and Flux. Use provider adapter pattern similar to LLM Node.
Criteria:
- Image Gen Node supports all listed providers
- Adapters implement a common interface
- Streaming/thumbnails supported in node preview
acceptance_criteria: Image Gen Node supports all listed providers
